resources.string: Note\n This application sends SMS to get vehicle information
Created in Public Interest by Shreyansh Mohnot\n developershreyansh@gmail.com

This application provides quick and easy access of vehicle registration information to the citizens of the country through Central Government Repository. The details sometimes are not updated due to in process of digitization of records.

• Enter Vehicle Number(eg. MH05 SH 9000). 
For GJ numbers put 0 before district code(eg. GJ5 => GJ05). 
• Tap on Send SMS.
• Wait for 30-40 seconds. 
• You will receive an SMS containing information regarding the vehicle number.
Thanks for using the application. \nFor any query regarding this application please email me at developershreyansh@gmail.com
